languages.text: "Ты... Ты все совсем неправильно понял{mf||а}". {n}Лицо Хейдари мертвеет. Она вытаскивает из одежды шкатулку, еще недавно украшавшую ваши покои, и роняет на пол. Из раскрывшейся шкатулки выпадает сложенный листок, на котором начертано "Спасибо".{/n} "Мне жаль, что ты не оценил{mf||а} мою забаву. Впредь я не побеспокою тебя с подобными играми".

"You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

languages.text: “你……你真是完全误会了我的意思。”{n}婕伊的表情变得凝重起来。她掀开衣服，拿出来藏在下面的东西，那是一个原本放在你房间里的装饰盒。她把装饰盒扔在地上，盒盖被摔开了，一张折好的纸掉了出来，上面写着“谢谢你”。{/n}“你并不喜欢我这个小小的玩笑，我很抱歉。以后我再也不会和你开这样的小玩笑了。”
languages.original_text: "You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたは…このことを完全に誤解しているね」{n}彼女は表情を曇らせる。彼女は服の下に隠してあったもの…最近あなたの部屋に飾られていた飾り箱を取り出し、床に落とす。箱の蓋が開き、折り畳まれた紙切れが落ちる。そこには「ありがとう」と書かれていた。{/n}「あたしのささやかな冗談は楽しんでもらえなかったみたいだね。今後はこういう遊びで迷惑をかけることはしないよ」
languages.original_text: "You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Me... me ha malinterpretado completamente». {n}Su expresión se desmorona. Saca algo que escondía entre sus ropas: una caja decorativa que hasta hace poco estaba expuesta en tus aposentos, y la deja caer al suelo. La tapa de la caja se abre y un papel doblado se sale. Tiene escritas las palabras «muchas gracias».{/n} «Lamento que no haya disfrutado con mi bromita. No le incordiaré más con juegos de este estilo».
languages.original_text: "You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

traits.locale_text: «Me... me ha malinterpretado completamente». {n}Su expresión se desmorona. Saca algo que escondía entre sus ropas: una caja decorativa que hasta hace poco estaba expuesta en tus aposentos, y la deja caer al suelo. La tapa de la caja se abre y un papel doblado se sale. Tiene escritas las palabras «muchas gracias».{/n} «Lamento que no haya disfrutado con mi bromita. No le incordiaré más con juegos de este estilo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous... vous méprenez sur mes intentions. » {n}Son visage se ferme. Elle retire un objet dissimulé sous ses vêtements, une petite boîte qui décorait jusqu'à il y a peu vos quartiers, et le laisse tomber au sol. Son couvercle s'ouvre et un bout de papier replié s'en échappe. Vous pouvez y lire le mot : « Merci ».{/n} « Je suis désolée que ma petite plaisanterie vous ait déplu. Je ne vous embêterai plus avec mes jeux. »
languages.original_text: "You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... vous méprenez sur mes intentions. » {n}Son visage se ferme. Elle retire un objet dissimulé sous ses vêtements, une petite boîte qui décorait jusqu'à il y a peu vos quartiers, et le laisse tomber au sol. Son couvercle s'ouvre et un bout de papier replié s'en échappe. Vous pouvez y lire le mot : « Merci ».{/n} « Je suis désolée que ma petite plaisanterie vous ait déplu. Je ne vous embêterai plus avec mes jeux. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr ... Ihr versteht das völlig falsch." {n}Ihre Miene erstarrt. Sie holt etwas unter ihrer Kleidung hervor – ein dekoratives Kästchen, das zuvor in deinem Quartier lag – und wirft es zu Boden. Der Deckel öffnet sich und ein gefalteter Zettel fällt heraus. Dort steht das Wort "Danke".{/n} "Es tut mir leid, dass Euch mein kleiner Spaß nicht zugesagt. Ich werde Euch in Zukunft nicht mehr mit meinen Spielen belästigen."
languages.original_text: "You... you've taken this completely the wrong way." {n}Her expression shutters. She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... Ihr versteht das völlig falsch." {n}Ihre Miene erstarrt. Sie holt etwas unter ihrer Kleidung hervor – ein dekoratives Kästchen, das zuvor in deinem Quartier lag – und wirft es zu Boden. Der Deckel öffnet sich und ein gefalteter Zettel fällt heraus. Dort steht das Wort "Danke".{/n} "Es tut mir leid, dass Euch mein kleiner Spaß nicht zugesagt. Ich werde Euch in Zukunft nicht mehr mit meinen Spielen belästigen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu... Bunu tamamen yanlış anlamışsın." {n}Yüzü ifadesizleşiyor. Kıyafetlerinin altına gizlediği bir şeyi, odandaki rafta duran dekoratif kutuyu çıkarıyor ve yere bırakıyor. Kutunun kapağı açılıyor ve içinden katlanmış bir kâğıt düşüyor. Üzerinde "Teşekkürler" sözcükleri yazılı.{/n} "Küçük şakamı hoş karşılamadığın için üzgünüm. Gelecekte bir daha seni böyle oyunlarla rahatsız etmeyeceğim."

She removes something that was secreted under her clothes — a decorative box that was recently on display in your chambers — and drops it on the floor. The box's lid opens and a folded piece of paper falls out. The words "Thank you" are written on it.{/n} "I'm sorry you didn't enjoy my little jest. I won't bother you with any more games like this in the future."
